spare_id = #{spareId},
name = #{name},
model_id = #{modelId},
type_id = #{typeId},
vender_id = #{venderId},
use_status = #{useStatus},
status = #{status},
in_time = #{inTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.*, b.name as model_name, c.name as type_name, d.name as vender_name from t_omm_instrument a LEFT JOIN t_omm_equipment_model b ON a.model_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_omm_equipment_type c ON a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_omm_equipment_vender d ON a.vender_id = d.id where a.id = #{id}
select a.*,b.name from (select count(1) as count,type_id as id from t_omm_instrument where status = 1 group by type_id) a left join t_Omm_Equipment_Type b on a.id = b.id order by a.count desc
